class_example: Venerable Raṭṭhapāla obtained neither alms nor a refusal; on the contrary, he obtained only verbal abuse.

class_example: jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādaṃ attha, mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī
english_translation: Meditate, monks! You must not be negligent, do not have remorse afterwards! This [is] our advice for you.

class_example: n'eva tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti, na adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ vedeti
